mapper.select: select board_idx, title, hit_cnt, date_format(created_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as created_dt from t_board where deleted_yn = 'N' order by board_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board (title, contents, created_dt, created_id) values ( #{title}, #{contents}, now(), 'admin' )
mapper.select: select board_idx, title, contents, hit_cnt, date_format(created_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as created_dt, created_id from t_board where deleted_yn = 'N' and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.update: update t_board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, updated_dt = now(), updated_id = 'admin' where board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.delete: update t_board set deleted_yn = 'Y', updated_dt = now(), updated_id = 'admin' where board_idx = #{boardIdx}
